attributes.action: Ban Donald Trump from entering the United Kingdom or rescind his state visit
attributes.additional_details: His most recent violation is the retweet of the far right group by the name of 'Britain First' Which will be seen by tens of millions of people worldwide and will result in giving this group, and others like it, a much larger platform to spread hatred and division among our communities. We need to stand up to this behaviour and show The President of the United States that we do not and will not accept this sort of behaviour, regardless of fame, influence, wealth, or power. Trump's behaviour needs to be addressed.
attributes.background: Donald trump has repeatedly perpetuated the views of extremist far right groups which only have the effect of sowing hate into our communities. They have result in direct increases of hate crimes both online and physically.
